name: GetVendors
description:
Retrieve a list of vendors for a given organization.

This tool fetches vendor information from Entrata for a specified organization. Use it to obtain a comprehensive list of vendors associated with an organization ID.

parameters.name: organization_subdomain
parameters.description: The subdomain representing the organization to retrieve vendors for.

parameters.name: vendor_request_body
parameters.description: Provide the request body as a JSON array for fetching vendor data. This should include any necessary parameters required by the API to process the vendor data request.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number for pagination of the vendor list.

value_schema.description: The page number of paginated respons.

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: The number of items to return per page in the response for pagination.

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

parameters.name: include_pagination_links
parameters.description: Set to 1 to include pagination links in the response body, 0 to exclude.

value_schema.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description: The page number of paginated respons.

value_schema.description: The page number of paginated respons.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

parameters.name: X-Send-Pagination-Links
parameters.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.

value_schema.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.
